name: COPY.THAT - Super Easy and Addictive Fun
name_original: COPY.THAT - Super Easy and Addictive Fun
description:
So simple and addictive!

Simply copy moves at each turn and you get IQ as a score!
It's so simple, anyone can play (even moms and dads)

How to PLAY:
1. Watch the moves made by AI
2. Copy the moves made by AI in your turn
Very simple right?


Copy.That supports different modes for different people!
- Classic Mode: Easy, Normal, Hard with a simple game rule.
- Battle Mode: Play with friends and other players on social media.
- Crazy Mode: Extremely challenging rule for the crazies.
- Time Attack Mode: Check how fast you can get it done!


With a daily dose of Copy.That, you can stimulate your brain for enhanced brain capacity for memory and pattern recognition.

- Check your daily IQ, keep your brain in check!
- Play with Friends, Family and Enemies!
- Let your friends know how good you are!


Practice everyday and enhance your brain power!


(Cloud Save available with Facebook login)
